ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] A recap of the 6/6 patch.
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the breakdown Rokenn!  My thoughts. Lots of Bard news from yesterday s patch.  Of course as usual none of the changes were listed in the patch
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the breakdown Rokenn! My thoughts.

Lots of Bard news from yesterday's patch. Of course as usual none of the
changes were listed in the patch message (Gordon if you read this put a big
yellow post-it note on your computer monitor that reads: 'ANY BARD CHANGES?'
*grin*). Anyway here is the good, bad, and the ugly:

The Good
Ah at last a reason to go buy a Psalm ;-)

The Bad
ACK! Chains was a big time annoyance for me last nite. This nerf did hit
hard. My mobs went from stopping at 33% or so to stopping at 25% to 20%.

The Ugly
Kellin's has been referred to our testing department.
*About time, lets hope they fix lullaby this time.
Let's hope so. Pulled it out after the patch as usual to try it again. Got
80% resists on a mobs 15 levels below me. Useless, dememmed immediately.

The "Broken Quest Issues" are not broken quests. They are preexisting
stories for future expansion.
*Not sure if this applies to Fabian or not.

Again, I don't buy this answer. These partial quests have been around
forever. You wouldn't think there would be much story behind replacing a
guy's lute strings anyhow.

Kitasi
